tweet: Dear #Cardano Community. It looks like some of the well-known community members (either officials, ambassadors, or normal members) are being impersonated on a massive scale. Please don’t fall victim for these scams and report any fake account you see. Thanks! #ada #reportscam.

"Charles Hoskinson Explains: How the #Byron to #Shelley wallet transition will work"  On April 21st, @IOHK_Charles sat down for an update on how #Cardano will move from #Byron to #Shelley as well as the ITN rewards. Watch and read it here:  https://t.co/ai2KI4Bzz7
Great to see parts of the Cardano Documentation refresh already rolling out:  https://t.co/UjfA5sW9HZ if you are a Cardano wallet builder, an explorer or an exchange Adrestia is your best friend

We've seen another great week of growth for the #Shelley ITN, our incentivized, decentralized Proof of Stake testnet. We're now seeing 920 active pools, over 12.6B #ada staked and over 19k active users. Great foundations for Shelley on mainnet! #Cardano #decentralization @Cardano  https://t.co/nRkoEYTyOT
